results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(14).
reference: Roger Penrose, "The Road to Reality, A complete guide to the Laws of the Universe", Jonathan Cape, London, 2004, page 56. [From _Olivier Gérard_, May 22 2009]
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 1).
formula: a(n) = 1 + floor((n+2)/4) - floor((n+1)/4) + 5*(floor((n+4)/4) - floor((n+3)/4)) for n > 0. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 10 2017
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 15000); x=contfrac(sqrt(14)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010123.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009
xref: Cf. A010471 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
